column4: is there a log file for smb?  All of a sudden my Ubuntu 9.10 machine can't connect to smb and I'm trying to debug why
thanks.  I just found it.  The problem appears to be an error 'open_socket_in:  Address already in use'.  Ever seen that?
no. don't really know anything about samba. i just have it installed and thought i'd look up where the log files were for you
